data.message: Facebook, I think my account has been locked due to the confusion and is now in a state of special tribute. Please Facebook solve for me

replies.message:
Hi Văn. If you're locked out of your account, you may have the option to reset your login information by:
-Answering your security question
-Getting help from friends
Learn more here: https://www.facebook.com/help/228372557180280. 
Have a good one! -Meagan
I need a help. I have already reset my password. I am told to  log in within 24 hrs by my new email and passworb. Bt i cant not log in. What can i do? Its urgent. Plz.

Facebook is there anyway to stop those annoying notices from popping up, I mean when your doing something else on facebook and they kkeep popping messages and stuff from other ppl, its annoying especially when I'm playing games
